VRDisplayExitPresent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The exitPresent() method of the interface stops the VRDisplay presenting a scene.

blockquote.para: Note: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayExitPresent.returns: A promise that resolves once the presentation has ended. If the VRDisplay is not presenting when exitPresent() is called, the promise will reject.
